General.Description: ZCash is a decentralized and open-source cryptocurrency codec that offers powerful privacy protections. In addition, ZCash is a driven security cryptocurrency.
General.Features: The feature of the ZEC coin is to maintain the mutual change, the cryptocurrency units must be unlinked from their history to one unit achieved as the other units. Zcash is available for cryptocurrency by unbinding coin-shielded coins from their history on the blockchain.
General.Technology: ZCash uses Equihash as a hash algorithm. It is a PoW algorithm on asymmetric hard disk memory on a general problem. It relies on high RAM requirements to operate the generation limitation and ASIC development is not feasible, like Ethereum.
